org.restlet.engine.http
Class Call

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.engine.http.Call
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientCall, ServerCall
public abstract class Call
extends java.lang.Object

Low-level call for the HTTP connectors.

Author:
Jerome Louvel
